name: Grand Hustle
description: Grand Hustle is a hybrid strain that is designed to help give users a vacation from the hustle and bustle of their lives. A cross of Afgoo and Green Crack, this strain takes after the more sativa nature of the latter and provides uplifting, focused effects. Potent and well-balanced, this hustle is one thatâ€™s worth giving a try.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Relaxed, Focused, Creative, Euphoric, Stress, Fatigue, Lack of Appetite, Depression, Pain, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Dry Eyes, Dizzy
